title: Lover A

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You are a random role from the largest good faction that exists in the game. Your full role is revealed on death.
- Lover B (3766) will always spawn.
- While alive, you can win with Lover B's faction as well.
- If Lover B dies, you also die.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Hang almost every criminal and evildoer, while allowing your true love to remain.

desc:
Post 3765
*For love shall not part us.*
